project_abstract.cdata: The Second Irrigated Agriculture Intensification Project aims to 1) increase agricultural production; 2) increase farmers  incomes; and 3) establish mechanisms for sustainable use, development, and management of water and land resources in irrigated areas of the most important agricultural production region in China. The project covers five provinces with subprojects spread over 1050 townships in 131 counties in 28 prefectures and cities. There are four main components. Component 1 consists of irrigation and drainage works, mainly small-scale works, including civil works for irrigation and drainage facilities improvement and extension, and secondary and tertiary level canal rehabilitation. The second finances agricultural intensification and support services, including land and soil improvement; provision for more intensive use of organic fertilizer; strengthening production of high quality seeds; improving agricultural extension systems with better facilities, equipment, and staff training; establishing fertilizer blending plants to provide chemical fertilizer; building organic manure digesting pits; providing agricultural production inputs and materials; and promoting science & technology and integrated pest management. Component 3, afforestation and environmental monitoring, increases the vegetative cover as well as controls pests and disease, and provides machinery and equipment. Component 4 supports project implementation and management, and institutional development.

P049700.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>加强农业灌溉项目二期</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>项目主要内容包括新建和改造机电井45213座，推广适用的节水灌溉技术，扩大水浇地面积，提高项目区灌溉保证率和防洪除涝标准，改善灌溉面积153.47万公顷；开展平整土地、秸秆还田和增施有机肥料；新建农田防护林47282公顷；建设农田机耕路28336公里；实施82809人月的农民培训，提高项目区农民科学种田的水平；购买农业生产资料，开展经济自立灌排区的试点，以促进灌排管理体制的改革；建立管理信息系统，加强对整个项目区的宏观管理。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
